Action_Trigger: Alert if AUC drop > 0.03 or ECE > 0.05 compared to baseline; investigate & retrain if confirmed.
If any subgroup AUC < 0.75 or sensitivity < 0.80, collect more data / adjust training.

Metrics_Monitored: Repeat REFUGE/PAPILA-style evaluation or new multi-center dataset
Action_Trigger: Regulatory re-assessment, release new model version if improved.
